column5: overview
A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy.
When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped in it for decades.
A romantic comedy about finding love later in life, despite grumpy exteriors.
Women bond over life, love, and heartbreak in this emotional story.

column3: Father of the Bride Part II
column5: The story of a father coming to terms with his daughter’s growing family.
A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue.
A WWII squad goes behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
Batman faces his nemesis, the Joker, who plunges Gotham into chaos.
A slow-witted but kind man witnesses and influences key historical events.
A thief who enters dreams must plant an idea into a target's mind.
A hacker discovers reality is a simulated world controlled by machines.
A former Roman general seeks revenge against a corrupt emperor.
Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and eventual redemption.
Interwoven stories of criminals in Los Angeles.
A lion prince flees exile only to reclaim his kingdom.
A team of explorers travel through a wormhole to save humanity.
A teenager travels back in time and risks changing his own future.
A romance unfolds aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.
Earth’s mightiest heroes unite to stop an alien invasion.
A theme park suffers disaster when cloned dinosaurs escape.
A young farm boy joins a rebellion against an evil empire.
The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his son.
A young FBI cadet seeks help from an imprisoned cannibal to catch a serial killer.
An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club.
Death row guards witness supernatural events surrounding an inmate.
Rival magicians engage in a competitive battle with dangerous consequences.
An undercover cop and a mole try to identify each other.
In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, rebels fight a tyrant.
The story of Facebook’s founding and rise.
A young drummer faces abuse from his demanding teacher.
A freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner.
Two aspiring artists fall in love in Los Angeles.
The rise and fall of a stockbroker involved in crime and corruption.
A teenager becomes Spider-Man and meets alternate versions from other dimensions.
A family of superheroes balances saving the world and family life.

column3: The Lion King II: Simba's Pride
column5: The daughter of Simba faces a new challenge to the Pride Lands.
Personified emotions try to guide a girl through a difficult move.
A clownfish searches for his lost son.
An old man ties balloons to his house to fulfill a lifelong dream.
Scottish warrior leads a revolt against English rule.
A slacker becomes embroiled in a kidnapping case.
A group of intergalactic criminals must work together to save the galaxy.
The king of Wakanda fights to protect his people and the world.
A wisecracking mercenary gains accelerated healing powers.
An ex-hitman comes out of retirement to seek vengeance.
An astronaut struggles to survive on Mars after being left behind.
A regiment of African-American soldiers fights in the Civil War.
An Indian teenager reflects on his life after winning a quiz show.
A hunter finds a fortune that puts him in the path of a relentless killer.
A legendary concierge tries to protect a priceless painting.
